Uses of Class
com.google.publicalerts.cap.CapException.Reason

Packages that use CapException.Reason
com.google.publicalerts.cap This package contains the core classes that encode the CAP protocol as well as classes that can parse and write CAP messages from a variety of wire formats. 
com.google.publicalerts.cap.feed This package contains classes to parse and write feeds (Atom, RSS, and more) enclosing CAP messages. 
com.google.publicalerts.cap.profile This package contains classes that handle specific CAP profiles, which specify a set of extra constraints on the CAP format. 
 

Uses of CapException.Reason in com.google.publicalerts.cap
